alert.note: Alert for Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 13 at 12:58PM PDT until March 15 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TUESDAY TO 11 PM PDT WEDNESDAY ABOVE 8000 FEET... * WHAT...Light to moderate snow expected above 8000 feet. Snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches can be expected, with up to 1 foot possible at the peaks. 1 to 3 inches of snow is expected above 7000ft. Winds will gust as high as 50 MPH. * WHERE...Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon. * WHEN...From 5 AM Tuesday to 11 PM PDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel in mountain roads may be difficult at times. Slick roads are likely where snow accumulates on roadways.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory means that periods of snow will cause travel difficulties. Expect slippery roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
